attributes.action: Stop the proposed housing development on farmland in Penllergaer, Swansea
attributes.background: Proposed development, initially for 850 new dwellings on farmland in and around the village of Penllergaer Swansea.....almost doubling the current village size! Impacting village life and make traffic conditions around J47 of the M4 significantly worse, dangerous to residents and motorists alike

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Planning is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
